generated.css: .our-services h1,.portfolio h1,.social-impact .social-impact-heading h1{font-size:2rem;text-align:center}.our-services .service-heading p,.social-impact .social-impact-heading p{color:#575757;padding-top:.5rem;text-align:center}nav{position:fixed;width:100%;background:#fff;z-index:1;box-shadow:0 1px 11px rgba(0,0,0,.25)}nav .nav-inner{display:grid;grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr;padding:.5rem 0}nav .nav-inner .logo{display:flex;align-items:center}nav .nav-inner .logo img{padding:0 1rem;width:90px}nav .nav-inner .burger-icon{display:none}nav .nav-inner .nav-items{display:flex;justify-content:center;align-items:center}nav .nav-inner .nav-items ul{padding:0 1rem;list-style:none;display:flex}nav .nav-inner .nav-items ul a{text-decoration:none;color:#000}nav .nav-inner .nav-items ul li:not(:first-child){padding-left:1.5rem}nav .nav-inner .nav-items ul li span{background:#3e66ae;padding:.5rem 1rem;border-radius:2rem;color:#fff}.mobile-side-nav{display:none}.banner{height:100vh;background-color:#ebf2ff}.banner .banner-inner{display:grid;grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr;height:100vh}.banner .left-side{padding:0 1rem;display:flex;flex-direction:column;justify-content:center}.banner .left-side h1{font-size:3rem;color:#3e66ae}.banner .right-side{padding:0 1rem;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center}.banner .right-side img{max-width:600px}.banner-box{display:flex;justify-content:space-between;text-transform:uppercase;color:#a0b4d7;font-size:1.5rem;padding:2rem 3rem;border:2px solid #bebebe;border-radius:5rem;position:relative;top:-50px;background:#fff;z-index:0}.about{display:grid;grid-template-columns:repeat(4,1fr);text-align:center;margin-top:calc(5rem - 50px);padding:0 1rem 50px}.about .box-item{width:300px;margin:0 auto;padding:4rem 1rem;border-radius:1rem;display:flex;flex-direction:column;justify-content:center}.about .box-item h1{text-transform:capitalize;padding-bottom:.5rem}.about .box-item:nth-child(odd){color:#4a71ff;border:1px solid #4a71ff}.about .box-item:nth-child(2n){position:relative;top:50px;color:#fff;background:#4a71ff}.our-services{text-align:center;margin-top:5rem}.our-services .service-heading{max-width:700px;margin:auto}.our-services .services{padding-top:1rem;display:grid;grid-template-columns:repeat(4,1fr);row-gap:2rem;font-weight:600}.our-services .services img{max-width:100px}.our-services .services p{padding-top:1rem}.our-services .services .service-item{padding-top:2rem}.portfolio{text-align:center;margin-top:5rem}.portfolio .portfolio-items{margin-top:3rem;padding:0 1rem;display:grid;grid-template-columns:repeat(4,1fr);gap:1rem}.portfolio .portfolio-items .portfolio-item{margin:auto;border-radius:8px}.portfolio .portfolio-items .portfolio-item img{border-radius:8px}.portfolio .portfolio-items .portfolio-item p{font-weight:600}.social-impact{margin-top:5rem}.social-impact .social-impact-heading{max-width:700px;margin:auto}.social-impact .social-impact-items{display:grid;grid-template-columns:repeat(2,1fr);column-gap:1rem;margin-top:3rem;padding:0 1rem 1rem}.social-impact .social-impact-items .social-impact-item{justify-self:center;background:#fff;box-shadow:0 1px 13px rgba(0,0,0,.25);border-radius:8px;width:300px;height:300px;display:flex;flex-direction:column;text-align:center;justify-content:center;align-items:center}.social-impact .social-impact-items .social-impact-item p{padding-top:2rem;font-weight:600;font-size:1.3rem}footer{margin-top:4rem;background:#4a71ff;text-align:center;padding:3rem 0;color:#fff}footer h1{font-size:1.5rem;margin-bottom:1rem}footer .contact{padding-top:2rem;display:grid;grid-template-columns:repeat(3,1fr);max-width:700px;margin:1rem auto 0}@media (max-width:1260px){.about{grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr;row-gap:2rem}.about .box-item:nth-child(2n){top:0}.portfolio .portfolio-items{grid-template-columns:repeat(3,1fr)}}@media (max-width:1000px){.banner .banner-inner{text-align:center;grid-template-columns:1fr}.banner .banner-inner .right-side{display:none}.banner-box{font-size:1rem}.portfolio .portfolio-items{grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr}.social-impact .social-impact-items{row-gap:2rem;grid-template-columns:1fr}}@media (max-width:700px){.our-services .services{grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr}.our-services .fake-item{display:none}}@media (max-width:650px){nav .nav-inner{padding:.5rem 1rem}nav .nav-inner .burger-icon{display:block;color:#333;font-size:3rem;justify-self:right}nav .nav-inner .nav-items{display:none}.hide-menu{transform:translateX(100%)}.show-menu{transform:translateX(0)}.mobile-side-nav{transition:.3s;display:block;position:fixed;z-index:2;background:#3e66ae;color:#fff;width:100%;height:100%}.mobile-side-nav .nav-items{position:relative;top:calc(50% - 157.5px);text-align:center}.mobile-side-nav .nav-items ul li{list-style:none}.mobile-side-nav .nav-items ul li:not(:first-child){padding-top:1rem}.mobile-side-nav .nav-items ul li a{color:#fff;text-decoration:none;font-size:2rem}.mobile-side-nav .close-item{position:absolute;right:1rem;top:1rem;font-size:2rem}.about{grid-template-columns:1fr}.our-services .service-heading{padding:0 1rem}.portfolio .portfolio-items{grid-template-columns:1fr}.social-impact .social-impact-heading{padding:0 1rem}}@media (max-width:600px){.banner-box h1{font-size:1rem}}@media (max-width:500px){.banner-box{padding:1rem 2rem}footer .contact{grid-template-columns:1fr;row-gap:3rem}}
